eeka wachanaye parisamapthiyenma thiyunu maraniya prapathayak.mitar 1600 ta wada usaka indala 1200 wenakam, mudune indala polawata siras athata anshaka 40 - 45 konayaka aanathiyakin pahalata thiyunu nerum osse gal parwatha, saha bawume wawunu wananthara kotasin yuktha loku prapathayak.

me wana wita chithrapatayen laba athi samastha aadayama indiya rupiyal koti 284. 83k wanawa.ee anuwa 2018 wasare wadima aadayamak lada chithrapataya wana mehi sanje dath ge charithaya randir kapur rangana athara anushka sharma,sonam kapur, manisha koyirala, diya mirsa,wiki kaushal wani nala nili pirisak ranganayen dayaka wenawa.

ithin pinwath yaluwe, oba sidukala me mahanargha pinkame balayen obata thriwidha rathnaye aashirwadayama labewa.

amali kiyanne tikak duk windapu kenek.ee mokada eyage appachchi sar kenek unata hondatama bimata abbahi wela hitiye.amma nars kenek.amali punchima dawas wala amma narsing skul eke trenin.dennama rajaye sewakayo unath appachchige bimathkama nisa loku diyunuwak thibune na..amali shishyathwe liyanakalma hitiye pol athu gedaraka.padam karaddi kuppi lampuwa peralila gini gaththa kipa sarayakma.bila awilla amma ekka appachchi randu karanakota amali kiri ammalage gedara ekka yanawa.amma trenin giyama appachchi yaluwo ekka bonawa.amalige loku mama awilla appachchita banala amaliwa ekkan yanawa.habayi appachchita hithunama samahara dawas walata mara hondayi.amaliwa nawala kawala andum sodala okkoma karanawa.ee tharam honda manussayek thawath naha.biwwe nathnam dewiyek.me nisa appachchige bima gana amali tharahak thiyagaththe na.habayi duken hitiye.

lankawe bala deshapalanayata sambanda wikramasinha pawule samajikayeku lesa lakshman wikramasinha upatha labuwe 1927 marthu 25 wanadaya. 1932-45 kalaya thula kolambaa rajakiya widyalayen adhyapanaya labu ohu 1945 di kolambaa wishwa widyalayata athulath wi shishyathwayak laba gaththeya. 1948 di aarthika widyawen palamu panthiye upadhiyak labagaththe deshapalana widyawada apradhana wishayak lesa hadaramini. 1948 -1950 dakwa oksfarng hi kebar widyalayedi deshapalana darshanaya hadariya.
(mamath me wage kammali wada 2 , 3k kalane)
